connect4

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • connect4.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    The logic behind the Connect 4 game containing all of the rules the game follows.
    Version:
    4/12/2018
    Author:
    Jake Miller

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Cell[][] board
      The game board.
      private int cPlayer
      The current player.
      private int players
      The number of players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic()
      Default constructor setting up the board as a 7x6 2D array and sets the current player to 1.
      GameLogic(int players)
      Constructor setting setting up the board as a 7x6 2D array and sets the current player to 1.
